title: Guardian at the Gates of Self

panel_structure.description: Inside Evan's transparent head: a scientific observatory studying swirling subjective experiences. Objective instruments measure subjective storms. Golden thread marks moments of self-knowledge. Mirror walls show infinite observer regression.

Evan as armored guardian before ornate gates labeled 'My Story.' Behind: his truth garden. Outside: crowds with their versions of him. Guardian sword discerns between insight gifts and projection poison. Constellation reads 'Only I can authorize my authentic story.'

transformation_notes: This scene masterfully balances self-examination with self-protection. The interior observatory shows rigorous self-study while the guardian gate represents healthy boundaries around identity.
dialogue_rhythm: From paradox discovery to sovereign declaration
narrator_role: Philosophical guide through self-knowledge and self-protection
